applet_name: Auto post to Facebook page when a Google Calendar event is triggered.
applet_description:
1) Create a Google Calendar. (I called mine "Facebook posts.") 2) Create calendar entries at the date and time you want something posted to Facebook. Whatever you put in the "description" is what will be posted to Facebook. 3) Use this recipe to post when the Calendar event comes due. 
      Create a week (or a month) worth of posts at one time! Your Facebook page is constantly updated but your overall time investment is greatly reduced.
